name: Jack's Journey: An Oudor Game
description:
20 Years after the events of the first game, our main character Derek Hoff, his wife Millie Hoff (the girl that was in Derek's house) and Jenna the Nelfling (full name: Jenna Mkävän) have suffered and fought in the Nelfling-Human Wars which caused Nelflings and Humans to be segregated amongst each other. Some surviving Nelflings lived in what was a former rental apartment that they soon turned into the "Nelfling Refuge".  And only Derek's son Jack can save the land of Oudor and find his parents.

This game is made for Windows PC only and is a spin-off/sequel to The Magical Journey of Oudor.
